projects.title: Co-Founder at Liveasy
projects.description: Designed end-to-end flow and architecture of mobile & web application with features like GPS tracking, real time load management, user verification and admin dashboard. Used Flutter, Dart, GetX Framework, Firebase as tech stack.

projects.title: McMohan Burgers
projects.description: Implemented a simulation environment for McMahon's Burgers and tracked statistics such as average waiting time and queue length to identify areas for improvement.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This is the portfolio project of Chirag Gupta developed using HTML, CSS, React.js which displays Projects and experience of Chirag

projects.title: CoinTracr
projects.description: CoinTrackr is a comprehensive website that serves as a one-stop destination for all your cryptocurrency tracking needs. Whether you're an avid investor, or a curious enthusiast, CoinTrackr has you covered with latest information and analysis.

projects.title: TECHY STAR
projects.description: This project contains a website for an imaginary TechyStar which is a leading tech company dedicated to providing innovative solutions for the everyday problems faced by individuals, with a particular focus on enhancing problem-solving abilities in children.
